original_title: Ragi√± Epu Mapu/Between Two Worlds: Voices of the Elders and the Youth
overview: The story of the Mapuche peoples' struggle to retain their Indigenous culture in the modern world of Southern Chile. It is a story that acknowledges the cultural pride of Indigenous people, as well as the challenges of immigration and assimilation. A collective vision of a people trying to preserve that which is most sacred to them: their land and culture.
title: Between Two Worlds: Voices of the Elders and the Youth
